data.actual_result: redirects to /r/LetsChat because the vanity url provided by Discord ends in /chat
data.expected_result: The url provided was a quick-redirect invite link someone was using for their server.
data.short_description: Entering a url in the Join a Server feature in the app that isn't an instant invite link can put you in the wrong server
data.steps_to_repro: - Click the + to add a server. - Click 'Join a server' - Enter  rchat- End up in /r/LetsChat
